content:
Congress can propose an amendment with ⅔ approval of both chambers (67/100; 290/435)
OR
2/3rds of state legislatures can call a constitutional convention to propose an amendment (34/50)

⬇️

Amendment must be RATIFIED by 3/4ths of state legislature (38/50)
OR
3/4ths of special state Ratifying conventions (38/50)

very state driven
	they didn’t want congress controlling the means of the state government
